text: BK Ume-Trixa is a sports club in Umeå, Sweden, established in 1981. The club earlier played rink bandy and bandy, but now instead runs women's ice hockey. The women's bandy team played seven seasons in the Swedish top division. == References == ==External links== *Official website Category:1981 establishments in Sweden Category:Defunct bandy clubs in Sweden Category:Ice hockey teams in Sweden Category:Sport in Umeå Category:Ice hockey clubs established in 1981 Category:Bandy clubs established in 1981
title: BK Ume-Trixa
